channel.title: Meeting – Agile Staffordshire
channel.description: A user group for Agile, XP, Software Craftsmanship and Software Development, based in Stafford

item.title: Git Introduction January 2015
item.dc:creator: Trevor Adams
item.description: There was a great vibe this January; our first meeting of 2015. Paul Williams opened the year with a great session introducing Git. The session served as a useful introduction to those new to Git as a version control mechanism and incorporatedÂ rebasing techniques for those with intermediate skills. We experienced a wide spread of issues […]

item.title: F# and Functional Programming Wrap-up
item.dc:creator: Trevor Adams
item.description: Agile Staffordshire were fortunate to have Ian RussellÂ talk to us about functional programming. Ian’s session on functional programming really got us fired up withÂ something new. I was swept away with Ian’s abundant enthusiasm for the discipline; thank you, Ian! If you get the chance to meet Ian and discuss F#, I think you’d be wise […]

item.title: Lego Robots

item.title: Review: Brooklyn Beta and Maintainable C

item.description: Brooklyn Beta A big thank you Â to Trevor for sharing his brilliant talk on experiences at Brooklyn Beta earlier this year, which focused on web platforms delivering. It is really encouraging to see the move towards organisations exposing data allowing the creation of business that can deliver the real value of that data by matching […]

item.title: Last month’s agile experience session with Craig Judson
item.dc:creator: paulswilliams
item.description: Firstly, I’d like to thank Craig for an excellent October session on Codeweaver’s experiences with agile. It was our first session in a Staffordshire University lecture theatre so well done Craig for dealing with such an imposing stage, especially with the growing number of attendees ðŸ™‚ It was good to see this increase in newcomers […]

item.title: October 2013 – Agile Experience Guest Speaker
item.dc:creator: Neil Kidd
item.description: Date: Wednesday 30th October 2013 Time: 7:00pm Venue: Staffordshire University – Stafford Campus (Lecture Theatre 2 – the Octagon building) This month we welcome Mr Craig Judson from Codeweavers Limited. Codeweavers are a local company, based just outside Stafford in Dunston. They adopted agile techniques in 2007, starting with Scrum and have continued to evolve […]

item.title: September 2013 – Retrospective
item.dc:creator: paulswilliams
item.description: Following some discussion on the Google Groups, and offline, we decided to do an ad-hoc group retrospective during Septembers meet up. We didn’t follow the normal retro questions – what’s gone well, what can be improved etc. Rather, we brainstormed future session ideas, tabled the possibility of changing venues. We’ve been challenged on how to […]
